pageProps.html:
Intersection of Two Arrays

Description

doc

Solutions

First Idea

/**
 * @param {number[]} nums1
 * @param {number[]} nums2
 * @return {number[]}
 */
var intersection = function (nums1, nums2) {
  const nums2Set = new Set(nums2)
  return [...new Set(nums1)].filter((v) => nums2Set.has(v))
}
  • Time Complexity: O(n)
  • Space Complexity: O(n)
